Case Description: Contessa has stolen the Teatro Amazonas

Presentation.Clue Description: Our first clue is just coming in through the ACME Crimenet Computer.
Presentation.Untranslated Text Placeholder: Patty er i hovedstaden i et land nord for Tyskland, hvor hun deltager i åbningsaftenen for Verdensballetten. Kongefamilien bidrager selv til balletten og deltager i festivalen årligt.
Presentation.Translated Text: Patty is in the capital of a country north of Germany, attending opening night of the Verdensballetten ballet festival. The royal family themselves contribute to the ballet, and attend the festival annually.

Clues: Capital of a country north of Germany

Presentation.Clue Description: Hearing that sound brings me back to a bygone era. When men were men, and detectives were black and white...

Clues: City near the Great Australian Bight

Round 1.Clue Description: Eartha left Cape Fear and travelled south.

Clues.Clue: Eartha chugged her chime to the capital of South Carolina. Name it.
She jet-ski'd down the coast to Savannah. What state is she in?
She bulldozed her way due west across the border. What state is she in?
She hung her bell at the site of the Civil War's Battle Of Vicksburg. What state is she in?

Video Transcripts: Gumshoes, I spotted Eartha in one of the world's largest cities. She was fighting ten bulls at once in the world's largest bullfighting arena. And she was winning. Now listen, I know she hid the bell in a park right behind the monument called Los Niños Héroes. It honours young cadets who died defending their school during a US invasion in the 1840's. Trust me, that's where you'll find Eartha and the bell.

Clues: One of the world's largest cities
